library:
A implementation of kinematics as a plugin based on TRAC-IK.
<class name="cached_ik_kinematics_plugin/CachedTracIKKinematicsPlugin" type="cached_ik_kinematics_plugin::CachedIKKinematicsPlugin" base_class_type="kinematics::KinematicsBase">
Kinematics plugin for persistently caching IK solutions computed with the TRAC-IK kinematics plugin.
